summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use, amending Sections 23.41.004, 23.41.006, 23.50.012, 23.50.014, 23.50.027, and 23.54.015, repealing Chapter 23.68, adding a new Chapter 23.74 to the Seattle Municipal Code to establish a Stadium Area Transition Overlay District and amend the Downtown Design Guidelines to implement the Greater Duwamish Manufacturing/Industrial Center Plan.
committee: Neighborhoods, Growth Planning and Civic Engagement
